verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou my
Everlasting Portion
More than friend or life to me
All along
My pilgrim journey
Savior let me
Walk with Thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Not for ease
Or worldly pleasure
Not for fame
My prayer shall be
Gladly will I toil and suffer
Only let me
Walk with Thee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lead me through
The vale of shadows
Bear me o'er
Life's fitful sea
Then the gate
Of life eternal
May I enter
Lord with Thee
